title: Mental Wellbeing
content:
**Parameters: Stress, Emotional level**  
 Overproportionally high stress and low emotional level can be significant symptoms of epidemic conditions like Depression. Identifying and treating mental disorders at an early stage can be extremely beneficial the wellbeing of humankind.

title: Entertainment
content:
**Parameters: Emotional level**  
 Music services that not only understand your taste in music (spotify today), but also sense your emotions and configure playlists according to your mood. Imagine you're running: motivational music is played to reach your goals.

title: Product Testing
content:
**Parameters: Engagement** 
 You're holding the next-gen smartphone in your hands. How much does the desing and haptic makes you engage with the product? What are your inner brain reactions to interacting with the product?

title: Security
content:
**Parameters: Brainwave identification** 
 While using everyday wearables like headphones, you're automatically logged into your most important devices and accounts, effortlesly!

title: Immersive Experiences
content: **Parameters: Focus** Digital worlds are built according to your own brain metrics: Your emotional level varies digital experience like in-game environments.

title: Productivity
content: **Parameters: Focus, Engagement** While sitting in an university lecture or watching a video about recent innovation at home - your focus level can be monitored and makes realize the kind of media or content you engages most with and assimilate information the best.
